reviewText: okay tell truth i love it but needed add something not sure what but it needed something it is a very good movie does not have lot of action it more like a tell of boy lost needs find his way so goes and serach for his father and while trying find him he finds love and her and her frinds try help him learn to fight in a style way then daddy home and dramma n then at end pretty much the good fight starts and boom it done okay it have more but like i said need something with wat it has but it is a great movie to watch but it is like a chick flick but me i love all types
